Ezrom Legae (1938 ruo 1999) bụ onye South Afrịka na-akpụ ihe na onye na-ese ihe.
A mụrụ ya na Vrededorp, Johannesburg, Legae gụrụ akwụkwọ na Polly Street Art Centre malite na 1959; site na 1960 ruo 1964 ọ gara Jubilee Art Centre ma soro Cecil Skotnes na Sydney Khumalo rụọ ọrụ
N'afọ 1965, ọ ghọrọ onye nkuzi, wee bụrụ onye nduzi nke Jubilee Art Centre
N'afọ 1970, ọ natara agụmakwụkwọ nke nyere ya ohere ịga Europe na United States; n'agbata afọ 1972 na 1974 ọ bụ onye nduzi nke African Music and Drama Association Art Project.
Legae rụrụ ọrụ oge niile dị ka onye na-ese ihe; ya na ezinụlọ ya biri na Soweto ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ.
A maara Legae nke ọma maka nkọwa ọhụụ ya dị ike banyere pathos na mmebi nke ịkpa ókè agbụrụ - nkatọ ọ gbakwunyere na nnọgidesi ike nke ịda ogbenye na ịkpa ókè agbụrụ n'afọ ndị na-apartheid gasịrị
O mere nke ọma dị ka onye na-ese ihe na onye na-akpụ ihe oyiyi, isi na anụmanụ na-arụ ọrụ na mmanụ, conté, ọla nchara, ụrọ na mgbasa ozi agwakọta.
